laptop_n.example: I used my laptop to complete the assignment.

laptop_v.definition: To work or use a laptop.
laptop_v.example: She laptopped through the night at the coffee shop.

laptop_adj.definition: Describing something as related to or resembling a laptop.

laptop_adv.definition: In a manner related to working with a laptop.

laptop_conj.definition: Used to compare or link ideas related to laptops (rare).
laptop_conj.example: Laptop speaking, itâ€™s better to work at a desk.

laptop_prep.definition: Referring to position relative to a laptop (rare).
laptop_prep.example: He placed the charger by the laptop.
